divs: Sighting DetailsI was returning to Boston from a conference in Toronto with some colleauges ofmine, and we were just about to pick up the thru-way near Syracuse, New York. We were still heading south at this point as I noticed what looked like twoheadlights shining through the cloudy sky above. I thought they were twoindividual planes at first, but quickly disregarded that idea. I then thoughtthat they might actually be the reflection of a cars headlights in the window,so I moved my head around in an effort to make them disappear, to no avail. Theobject seemd to be moving due west, directly over the van. As it passed aboveus, I could tell that there was a definite structure behind the two headlights. I jumped over to the passenger side window to try to catch it again. As itre-emerged from behind the vans roof, I saw a much dimmer white light on theobjects underside which, combined with the brown sky, provided enough contrastto see the structure was that of a black, perfect isosceles triangle. Therewere no other lights on the object, so that once it had passed overhead, it wasno longer visible.I failed to mention to anyone what I was seeing until I jumped to the passengerside and they asked what was wrong. I calmly stated that I was watching somestrange, triangular aircraft. I was indeed remarkably calm until after thefact, when I realized that I had just had the classic flying triangle sighting.
Summary: Flying triangle in upstate New York
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Syracuse
There were no other sightings in Syracuse on or around October 22nd 2003
